graph.elements
Interface WeightedGraph<N extends Node,E extends WeightedEdge<? extends N>>

Type Parameters:
N - is the type of node to which the graph's edges will connect. they can be of type Node or any of its subclasses
E - is the type of edges contained in the graph. They can be of type WeightedEdge or any of its subclasses that connect to nodes of type N or any of its subclasses.
All Superinterfaces:
Graph<N,E>
All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicWeightedGraph
public interface WeightedGraph<N extends Node,E extends WeightedEdge<? extends N>>
extends Graph<N,E>

This interface specifies the properties of a graph that contains nodes and directed weighted edges that connect to two nodes.

Since:
Mar 16, 2014
Author:
Mathieu LŽger

Method Summary
 java.util.Set<E> getEdgesWithWeight(long weight)
          Returns a set of edges who's weight is equal to the requested weight.
 java.util.Set<E> getEdgesWithWeightAbove(long weight)
          Returns a set of edges who's weight is above the specified value.
 java.util.Set<E> getEdgesWithWeightBelow(long weight)
          Returns a set of edges who's weight is below the specified value.
 void resetEdgeWeights()
          Resets the weights of all the edges in the graph to the WeightedEdge.DEFAULT_EDGE_WEIGHT value.

addAllEdges, addEdge, getAllEdges, getAllNodes, getEdges, getEdgesOf, isEmpty, removeEdge, removeNode
 

Method Detail

getEdgesWithWeight

java.util.Set<E> getEdgesWithWeight(long weight)
Returns a set of edges who's weight is equal to the requested weight.

Parameters:
weight - is the weight to be matched
Returns:
Set of edges with a weight equal to the requested value

getEdgesWithWeightAbove

java.util.Set<E> getEdgesWithWeightAbove(long weight)
Returns a set of edges who's weight is above the specified value.

Parameters:
weight - weight above which the match edges weight must be.
Returns:
Set of edges with a weight above the specified value.

getEdgesWithWeightBelow

Returns a set of edges who's weight is below the specified value.

Parameters:
weight - weight below which the match edges weight must be.
Returns:
Set of edges with a weight below the specified value.

resetEdgeWeights

void resetEdgeWeights()
Resets the weights of all the edges in the graph to the WeightedEdge.DEFAULT_EDGE_WEIGHT value.
